players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was found dead last night. We need to share information and watch voting patterns closely."
You: "Bob is the mafioso — I investigated him last night."
Bob: "I didn't do anything — Alice is lying about investigating me. Why would she falsely accuse me so quickly?"
Bob: "I stand by what I said: Alice's accusation is suspicious. If she truly investigated me, why reveal it so quickly and risk being targeted? Diana, who did you investigate or protect last night?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and my result is accurate — Bob is lying to deflect. Diana, do you have any information to corroborate or challenge this?"

Diana: "I don't have any night info — I was a villager with no action. Alice, your quick accusation of Bob sounds risky but could be genuine. Bob's strong denial is suspicious. I want us to vote together to test Alice: vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
